main event: A civilian in Trinidad, Colorado reported a ground-visual observation of a 50 to 60 feet diameter black object with red lights, hovering over a valley and changing speeds to 120 mph. The duration of the sighting was 5 minutes, and it was believed to be a balloon.
interesting points: The object was described as solid with a black body and red lights, and its appearance and maneuvers were initially consistent with a light aircraft flying over the city.
The witness provided details of their observation, including information about the location, weather conditions, and the general appearance of the object.
It was the first time the witness had seen an object like this, and they believed it to be a craft from another world, although they were uncertain about the reason for its presence.
The witness estimated the speed of the object to be 1,320 mph and its distance from them to be 1,320 feet.
The report includes details such as the date, time, location, and additional witnesses who also saw the object.
sighted object: 50 to 60 feet diameter black object with red lights
